items.sentence: Tom brought up an interesting point during the meeting.
Tom called Mary and had her pick him up at the station.
There are way too many houses in this part of the city.
I\'ve seen you playing music at Chuck\'s Bar and Grill.
I immediately ran downstairs to see what was happening.
One more step and you would\'ve fallen down the stairs.
I didn\'t have the heart to tell Tom what had happened.
I didn\'t have time to finish cleaning the living room.
I didn\'t have to ask, since I already knew the answer.
I didn\'t know Tom was a criminal when I first met him.
I think you should go to Boston to be with your family.
You\'d be surprised how much money Tom has in the bank.
You\'ll have to ask Tom if you want to know the answer.
I didn\'t really expect you to be able to speak French.
I didn\'t want to learn French, but my parents made me.
Are you sure that you want to go to Australia with Tom?
Tom\'s injuries aren\'t as serious as we first thought.
Tom\'s lights were out, so I didn\'t knock on his door.
Why didn\'t you tell me you weren\'t going to be there?
Tom worries too much about what people think about him.
I\'d still like to know what happened here last Monday.
I wonder who will help Tom decorate the Christmas tree.

I wish you had told me when Tom expected me to be here.
Tom and Mary often played tennis together after school.
Here\'s some money. Go buy yourselves something to eat.
I told Tom he shouldn\'t eat anything that Mary cooked.
I told Tom that he shouldn\'t talk with his mouth full.
Tom still doesn\'t think this is the right thing to do.
I suspect Tom knows that Mary can\'t understand French.
I wish that I could speak French like a native speaker.
I want to know if you know who broke my kitchen window.
Tom hasn\'t sung professionally for almost three years.
We\'re looking for someone to teach French to our kids.
Tom has already been told several times not to do that.

I think it\'s really important for you to go to Boston.
I can\'t imagine living in a world without electricity.

Should parents help their children with their homework?
Tom and Mary attend church together on Sunday mornings.
When I was in Australia, I met many interesting people.

Tom tried to convince Mary to go to the dance with him.
Tom was the one who helped me pull weeds in the garden.
Tom was the one who suggested opening a bottle of wine.
Tom was the one who suggested that we visit the castle.
Tom has to finish what he\'s doing before he can leave.
When did you find out that Tom couldn\'t legally drive?
